activities: Partner and customer information placed into our web based SaaS platform which may include data such as name and address information depending on the customer requirements and their online processes. Webinfinity do not directly store sensitive personal or financial information.
personaldata: Organization, client, customer, visitor and includes automatic and manually processed data.
recoursemech: ICDR/AAA for all dispute resolutions for all data that is covered by Webinfinity's Safe Harbor certification.
